entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to freezing rain near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm. Ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain and a thunderstorm this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
